text:
Oh...
Yeah, it suits you well.

I see. So, what about the glasses?
Do you think I should go without them?

No, it's not like that. It's just...
it's different from the usual Yuika of L'Antica...
I'm looking forward to seeing the new Yuika.

...Yeah. In that case,
should I go with the glasses after all?
Ah, I'm glad I had the one that suits the costume.

Hehe, but...
I was a bit surprised when I heard about Yuika's dilemma.
Huh, P-tan, were you really thinking that!?

Come on...!
I'm serious here, so don't tease me!
